inclusion.criterion: Prior myeloablative or non-myeloablative allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: CMV, adenovirus or EBV infection persistent despite standard therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Received ATG, or Campath or other immunosuppressive T cell monoclonal antibodies within 28 days of screening for enrollment.
exclusion.label: triggers
